titleStmt.title: The happy shepheard: or; The young gallants courtship to his coy lady: to a pleasant new tune, sung in the last new opera. Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for C[harles]. Bates, at the White-Hart in West-Smitfield.,

notesStmt.note: Publisher's name, place and date of publication from Wing.
Imperfect: some print show-through, affecting text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

With: on verso, two settings of an advertisement printed oblong, side by side, both with royal arms at head, and title: The powder of simpathy, prepared at Florence, by Dominico Gratiano, Grician [Grecian].
